sentences.en: Courses are of two years' duration.
Gardeners classify plants accrdiring to their life - duration and frost susceptibility.
sentences.cn: 园艺学家根据植物的生命长短以及对霜害的敏感性去分类.

sentences.en: He was prepared to do this for the duration of the campaign.
sentences.cn: 他准备好在选举期间做这件事.

sentences.en: His wounds knocked him out of combat for the duration.
sentences.cn: 他的伤病使他在整个期间都无法参赛。

sentences.en: If the outflow falls the average duration of unemployment will correspondingly rise.
sentences.cn: 若流出人数下降,则失业的平均持续期将相应上升.

sentences.en: It is difficult to ascertain the exact duration of protection.
sentences.cn: 要弄清确切的予防有效期并不容易.

sentences.en: Let's hope the gunmen will hold off for the duration of the cease - fire .
sentences.cn: 但愿持枪歹徒在 停火 期间能约束自己的行动.

sentences.en: some stains may be there for the duration.
sentences.cn: 一些污迹可能长期地留在那里。

sentences.en: The course is of three years’ duration.
The duration of light was equal to that of darkness.
sentences.cn: 灯光一明一暗,间隔相等.

sentences.en: The duration of pain was prolonged.
The principal issues in dispute concern the duration of the future treaty.
sentences.cn: 有争议的主要问题牵涉到将来条约的期限.

sentences.en: The school was used as a hospital for the duration of the war.
sentences.cn: 战争期间这所学校被用作医院。

sentences.en: They were incarcerated for the duration of the war.
sentences.cn: 战争期间，他们被关在狱中。

sentences.en: They were put into detention camps for the duration.
sentences.cn: 他们被关在拘留营里直至战争结束.

sentences.en: Yeobright's visit to his mother was to be of short duration.
sentences.cn: 姚伯回来看他母亲,只是短期的勾留.

phrases.tran_cn: 工字续时间；活动持续时间
工作期间，工作延续时间；工字续时间
曝露时间；曝光时间；暴露时间
降雨持续时间，降雨历时
测试时间；试验持续期；试验时间

trans.tran_en: the length of time that something continues
